divs: sighting details i live about 3 miles north west from the nearest town, noted above. i went outside to let my dog out to do her thing at about 2:58 am. as i was looking at the horison i saw a large ball of light shoot stright up at high speed to approximately 80 feet. i thought some idiot had set off a comercial firework and i was expecting an explosion. instead it just hung moitionless in the air approximately 3\4 mile away, and after a few seconds, the light dimmed and i could see a lighted disk, silvery color, with red, blue, and i believe green light that seem to be on the outer edge of the disk. i soon realised it was moving away in a south-west direction from me slowly and soon i could only see the glow of the disk. it then started being blocked by the trees and other obstructions. i went back to bed. had trouble going to sleep though.
Summary: Raised from ground fast. Stopped then slowly headed south-east from my position.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Puxico
This sighting has never been favorited.
